slide.title: Marjory
slide.blurb: Marjory is a webservice for indexing and searching for documents, utilizing a full-text search engine.

list.bullet: It is somewhat similar to Solr, but is written in PHP and the underlying architecture allows for using search engines other than Lucene (no other adaptor is implemented yet, though).
Marjory is based on the Zend Framework and uses Zend_Search_Lucene as the default search engine.
